key_points: Self-driving cars are expected to become mainstream.

The rise of renewable energy technologies.

articles.title: Space Exploration: New Horizons
articles.description: Space exploration is entering a new era, with missions planned to Mars and the Moon. The possibilities for human exploration beyond Earth are expanding.
key_points: NASA plans to send humans to Mars by the 2030s.
The Artemis program aims to return humans to the Moon by 2024.
Space tourism is expected to become a billion-dollar industry.
